_migration.note: Mirrored copy; comments removed for valid JSON; content truncated only in inputs_pretty.

DevOps_Comments.File Description: Extracted the 'Peek View' full raw .json code prior to initiation of Test #5, detailing the additional lines of code and dynamic content added to rebuild the missing sections that previously existed during the last successful run of the flow
DevOps_Comments.File Purpose: To help with debugging flow issues by providing a snapshot of the raw Power Automate 'Compose' action's 'Peek Code' view that is used to compile the final .html document that will be created when Test #5 is initiated

inputs:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>HBPC_Admission_@{coalesce(if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Hines', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']))), 'Hines')}_@{coalesce(triggerOutputs()?['body/PatientFullName'], 'Unknown Patient')}</title>
    <style>... (truncated for brevity, identical to original) ...</style>
</head>
<body>... (truncated body identical to original root file) ...</body>
</html>
